title: Tiendita De Minerales 1
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar]]

My dear customer, are you done browsing already? Incredible! Is there anything that caught your attention? If so, please stop by and I will charge you for what you're taking.

Oh my goodness! Be careful with your backpack! The potions are frag-- 

//**Crack!**//

â€¦

If you break it, you pay for it. Do you remember that? Yeah. You will remember it forever.
